title: Savsa
description: A Fullstack website where you guess a random steam profile's age. Utilizes Steam's Web API for up-to-date user data.

title: StructViz
description: Application to visualize algorithms and data structures, making previously complex concepts more accessible through visual aid.

title: CatchIt
description: Modern version of the popular game "Catch" where the player gets points by catching falling objects.

title: Portfolio
description: Website displaying my frontend skills, recent projects, skills and contact information.
